text: rofl right on the nose with it

Hmmm - not an easy task. The plugin would need to be highly intelligent to be useful, especially if the original GF forms use conditions, addons and feeds.  If they’re just basic forms, then building a simple plugin might work, but then again it might be easier then to just recreate the forms using HS drag-drop.  Having said that, a GF export to HS would be a nice utility!

Does anyone know where the module “Page footer” pulls its information from <https://sg.d.pr/8VzKu6>?  I am trying to update a HS Email Subscription template and it has a Page Footer module in it but I just can’t figure out where it’s getting the text from.  I know I can swap it out with a text module but I’ve committed too much time in finding it and I simply need to know for sake of knowing!  (It’s not pulling from Settings/Marketing/Email/Configuration-Footer as that’s for email footers)
What’s wrong with just deleting and recreating the blog? It’s fast and easy, no?
We did that. It was just that several blog settings had to be set up again. :slightly_smiling_face:
